name: Ichneumon
damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ichneumon makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the ichneumon can't use its bite on another target.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Predator
special_abilities.desc: The ichneumon is immune to a dragon's Frightful Presence and has advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of dragons.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If the ichneumon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the ichneumon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The ichneumon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Mud Armor
special_abilities.desc: If the ichneumon spends an hour applying mud to itself, it can increase its AC by 2 for 8 hours.
